meanings.definition: The appearance or visual aspects of a street or road, including buildings, landscaping, and other elements.
meanings.sent1: The streetscape of our neighborhood is filled with colorful buildings and trees.
meanings.sent2: I love walking down the streetscape of the city and admiring the architecture.
meanings.sent3: The streetscape looked like a painting come to life with its vibrant colors and unique designs.
meanings.sent4: As the sun set, the streetscape transformed into a magical scene of shadows and light.
meanings.sent5: The streetscape was so picturesque that it felt like stepping into a postcard.

meanings.definition: The overall design or layout of a street or road, including its features and characteristics.
meanings.sent1: The streetscape of the town was carefully planned to include wide sidewalks and bike lanes.
meanings.sent2: The streetscape of the old town reflected a mix of historical and modern influences.
meanings.sent3: The streetscape seemed to have a mind of its own, leading pedestrians on unexpected paths.
meanings.sent4: The streetscape was like a puzzle, each building fitting perfectly into the overall picture.
meanings.sent5: The streetscape was a maze of possibilities, each turn revealing a new surprise.
